channel.title: My sound mod
channel.description: I´ve been working on an update for my [url='https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=462405446&searchtext=']mod[/url], which I will release after the December Update. Here´s a little [url='https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=2aS9dZwKgy4']sample[/url]. Any opinions, thoughts, suggestions? My update includes bsp´s which means I have two vpk´s. From what I heard, The December Update includes a new workshop-tool that allows merging multiple vpk´s into one mod. When publishing this, does workshop just replace old content with new ones?

item.title: My sound mod
item.dc:creator: Kaltsu
item.description:
I´ve been working on an update for my mod, which I will release after the December Update. Here´s a little sample. Any opinions, thoughts, suggestions?
My update includes bsp´s which means I have two vpk´s. From what I heard, The December Update includes a new workshop-tool that allows merging multiple vpk´s into one mod. When publishing this, does workshop just replace old content with new ones?

Read full topic
